bash_script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

ROOT_DIR="golden-django"
mkdir -p "$ROOT_DIR"
cd "$ROOT_DIR"

git init
mkdir -p "api"
mkdir -p "app"
mkdir -p "config"
mkdir -p "db"
mkdir -p "db/init"
mkdir -p "migrations"

cat > ".env" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=mysql://app:app@mysql:3306/app
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > ".gitignore" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
# StackSprint
.env
*.log
.DS_Store
__pycache__/
.venv/
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "Dockerfile" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
FROM python:3.12-slim
WORKDIR /app
COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY . .
EXPOSE 8080
CMD ["python", "manage.py", "runserver", "0.0.0.0:8080"]
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "README.md" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
# StackSprint Generated Project

Language: python
Framework: django
Architecture: mvp
Database: mysql

## Run

```bash
docker compose up --build
```
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "api/__init__.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'

EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "api/apps.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
from django.apps import AppConfig

class ApiConfig(AppConfig):
    default_auto_field = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
    name = 'api'
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "api/models.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
from django.db import models

class Item(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "api/urls.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
from django.urls import path
from .views import health, items

urlpatterns = [
    path('health', health),
    path('items', items),
]
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "api/views.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
from rest_framework.decorators import api_view
from rest_framework.response import Response

@api_view(['GET'])
def items(request):
    return Response([{"id": 1, "name": "sample"}])
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "app/health.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
def health():
    return {"status": "ok"}
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "app/routes.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
BASE_PATH = '/api/v1'
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "config/__init__.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'

EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "config/settings.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
from pathlib import Path

BASE_DIR = Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent
SECRET_KEY = 'dev'
DEBUG = True
ALLOWED_HOSTS = ['*']
INSTALLED_APPS = ['django.contrib.contenttypes', 'django.contrib.auth', 'rest_framework', 'api']
MIDDLEWARE = []
ROOT_URLCONF = 'config.urls'
TEMPLATES = []
WSGI_APPLICATION = 'config.wsgi.application'
DATABASES = {'default': {"ENGINE": "django.db.backends.mysql", "NAME": "app", "USER": "app", "PASSWORD": "app", "HOST": "mysql", "PORT": "3306"}}
LANGUAGE_CODE = 'en-us'
TIME_ZONE = 'UTC'
USE_I18N = True
USE_TZ = True
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "config/urls.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
from django.urls import include, path

urlpatterns = [path('api/', include('api.urls')),]
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "config/wsgi.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
import os
from django.core.wsgi import get_wsgi_application
os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'config.settings')
application = get_wsgi_application()
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "db/init/001_init.sql" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS items (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255)
);
INSERT INTO items DEFAULT VALUES;


EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "docker-compose.yaml" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
services:
  app:
    build: .
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    env_file:
      - ./.env
    depends_on:
      mysql:
        condition: service_healthy
  mysql:
    image: mysql:8.4
    environment:
      MYSQL_DATABASE: app
      MYSQL_USER: app
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: app
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
    volumes:
      - ./db/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "mysqladmin ping -h localhost -uapp -papp"]
      interval: 5s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 12
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "manage.py" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
#!/usr/bin/env python
import os
import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'config.settings')
    from django.core.management import execute_from_command_line
    execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "migrations/001_initial.sql" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS items (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255)
);


EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

cat > "requirements.txt" <<'EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942'
Django==5.1.5
djangorestframework==3.15.2
mysqlclient==2.2.7
EOF_STACKSPRINT_GEN_9942

echo "StackSprint project generated successfully."
echo "Run: docker compose up --build"
powershell_script:
$ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'

$RootDir = 'golden-django'
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $RootDir -Force | Out-Null
Set-Location $RootDir

git init
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'api' -Force | Out-Null
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'app' -Force | Out-Null
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'config' -Force | Out-Null
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'db' -Force | Out-Null
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'db/init' -Force | Out-Null
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'migrations' -Force | Out-Null

@'
PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=mysql://app:app@mysql:3306/app
'@ | Set-Content -NoNewline '.env'

@'
# StackSprint
.env
*.log
.DS_Store
__pycache__/
.venv/
'@ | Set-Content -NoNewline '.gitignore'

@'
FROM python:3.12-slim
WORKDIR /app
COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
COPY . .
EXPOSE 8080
CMD ["python", "manage.py", "runserver", "0.0.0.0:8080"]
'@ | Set-Content -NoNewline 'Dockerfile'

@'

## Run


class ApiConfig(AppConfig):

urlpatterns = [

@api_view(['GET'])

'@ | Set-Content -NoNewline 'api/views.py'

@'

@'

BASE_DIR = Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent

MIDDLEWARE = []
ROOT_URLCONF = 'config.urls'
TEMPLATES = []
WSGI_APPLICATION = 'config.wsgi.application'
DATABASES = {'default': {"ENGINE": "django.db.backends.mysql", "NAME": "app", "USER": "app", "PASSWORD": "app", "HOST": "mysql", "PORT": "3306"}}
LANGUAGE_CODE = 'en-us'
TIME_ZONE = 'UTC'
USE_I18N = True
USE_TZ = True
'@ | Set-Content -NoNewline 'config/settings.py'

urlpatterns = [path('api/', include('api.urls')),]

os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'config.settings')
application = get_wsgi_application()

INSERT INTO items DEFAULT VALUES;

  mysql:
    image: mysql:8.4

      MYSQL_DATABASE: app
      MYSQL_USER: app
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: app
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
    volumes:
      - ./db/init:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d

      - "3306:3306"

      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "mysqladmin ping -h localhost -uapp -papp"]
      interval: 5s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 12
'@ | Set-Content -NoNewline 'docker-compose.yaml'

@'

import os
import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'config.settings')
    from django.core.management import execute_from_command_line
    execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)

  name VARCHAR(255)
